Text: Nagogbodo̩ Jihofa kpai e̩do̩-mi du;
E̩do̩-mi abo̩ oñ nagwoguyo̩ ef uwe̩,
E̩gba kʼame̩nebi-mi mudabi tʼubi,
Todu uwe̩ je̩ ñw ma kpʼoji ajo̩-mi kpai o̩la-mi tʼeju-wñ;
E̩ fʼeju darʼabo uche̩ichi me̩, uwe̩ fʼame̩ne̩bibi chile̩che̩;
O uwe̩ e̩nebi e̩wñ ekpabie̩ muda pioo me̩;
Jihofa muda gugu e-wñ ogbegbele̩,
i añwʼile̩ go ef o̩kpakpa,
Jihofa achʼo̩do̩go̩ ki gbo̩gba tod abo ku ma che ma achekpa,
Oñ abo ku ma mʼodu-we̩ ake̩do̩nʼuwe̩,
Me̩ ki keli do̩ Jihofa ki dodo Zayo̩n!
Todu ibe e̩ne̩ ki agwili e̩bie̩ ki adafo te̩ ma;
O Jihofa, li mi eju!
todu kʼu dʼuñwulo̩-we̩ chaka ka dufu
Ura kʼabo uche̩ichi gwamʼumako mi me̩;
Ma fu Jihofa ma lugbo ajo̩ kʼi aka;
Ma arʼame̩ne̩bibi da nyʼef ojegu,
Todu egbenyo̩ e̩nale chʼo̩pioo n,
Kwane̩, O Jihofa! E̩ ki je̩ ñw one̩ du n;
Nyʼuma okpo, O Jihofa!
